entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Interpreter assertion in `JIT/Methodical/NaN/r4NaNconv_il_r/r4NaNconv_il_r.sh`- `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:5917` #65681
  • A delay is necessary when ECDSA-signing data with smart cards #65680
  • NTAuthentication.MakeSignature produces different thing on macOS, Windows and Linux #65678
  • [API Proposal]: make interface of Array and List classes more uniform #65677
  • coreclr build crashes on Linux with newest clang 13 #65676
  • Assertion failed 'lclVarType != TYP_UNDEF' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #65674
  • RyuJIT: IR Tree matching APIs #65673
    Future
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Loader.Tests` fail when run in randomized order #65672
  • [wasm] `System.Numerics.Tests.cast_toTest.RunDoubleExplicitCastToBigIntegerTests` fails with randomized test order #65671
  • [wasm][debugger] Support optional parameters in external methods #65670
  • "CoreCLR Pri0 Runtime Tests Run windows arm64 checked" leg timed out #65667
  • GZipCompressor implemented in netstandard2.0 package not working in .NETFramework4.8 #65665
  • VS debugger hangs when clicking on any button in WinformsControlsTest #65664
  • How to hot reload assemblies in mono runtime #65663
  • Serialization of abstract properties #65662
  • [API Proposal]: Activity.HasRemoteParent (and problematic docs for Activity.Parent) #65660
  • Please Introduce Specifier for Task to run it in P or L Core. #65659
  • x86: FramePointerRequiredEH is still set even if JIT removed empty try/finally #65658
    Future
  • Finally blocks not always ran on thrown exception #65657
  • [API Proposal]: Asynchronous DI support #65656
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.ZLibStreamUnitTests.Dispose_ClosesStream(disposeMode: 1) #65650
  • Test failure WindowsIdentityImpersonatedTests.RunImpersonated_NameResolution #65648
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\inl\\caninline_ro\\caninline_ro.cmd #65647
  • Tes failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse3\\LoadDquVector128_r\\LoadDquVector128_r.cmd #65646
  • Test failure profiler\\unittest\\metadatagetdispenser\\metadatagetdispenser.cmd #65645
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Bmi1.X64\\Bmi1.X64_r\\Bmi1.X64_r.cmd #65643

Closed

  • Type.IsPublic returns wrong answer for pointer and byref types #12355
    7.0.0
  • Extra file exist check in FileSystem.MoveDirectory on Unix #58240
    7.0.0
  • Libraries like HttpClient use legacy activity creation, requiring hacks in OpenTelemetry SDK #63868
    7.0.0
  • Can a File Stream open a File Larger than 5 Terabytes? #65602
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.DeflateStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success #65649
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64909
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [crossgen2] Promote single byref aot. #65682
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure all expected paths are logged on test failure #65666
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Ad-Hoc codesign on macOS-arm64 for crossgen2 binaries #65661
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable some previously skipped tests #65652
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Reenable ILStrip task on CI #65651
    area-Build-mono
  • Implement HttpTelemetry for HTTP/3 #65644
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm] Add support for a random test case orderer, for xunit tests #65628
    arch-wasm
  • Fix PGO jobs on official builds #65669
    area-Infrastructure
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move more things out of Internal/Cryptography #65393
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: revise approach for x64 OSR epilogs #65609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix liveness for dead non-removable partial definitions #65618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup CLRConfig #65655
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always build ref pack even in servicing releases #65579
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move iOS/tvOS simulator and Android emulator legs from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix several casing mismatches causing failures on Unix #65639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow to run tests for internal AzDo PRs #65603
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Suppress some new trimmer warnings #65580
    linkable-framework
  • Slightly relax file pattern for copying native components #65640
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65536
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add basic fake NTLM server to test NTAuthentication round-trip scenarios #65611
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Add per-test ids, and save logs to files for the test, and proxy messages #63564
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Faster vector == Vector128.Zero on arm64 #65632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Repair inconsistent nullability nullability on TypeConverter (#63186) #63874
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [resubmit] Fix bug of FastReducer used in BigInteger.ModPow #55122
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Added OnesComplement, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Expand indirection cell calls in IR instead of doing ad-hoc optimizations in codegen #65388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • fix few Filesystem tests on FreeBSD #65059
    area-System.IO, os-freebsd, test enhancement
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • Use ValueStringBuilder to fix allocations in ToString() methods of XdsDateTime and XsdDuration #64868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Equalize promoted #64206
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added support of atomic writes for custom value types #65635
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [WIP] [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-ILVerification, Future
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification
  • Add missing GC.SuppressFinalize #64997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [NO MERGE] SHM_NAME_MAX #64752
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #65329
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • Draft for x ^ 0 opt (#65071) #65072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Cleanup platform-specific ifdefs #65624
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Improved handling of Antimirov mode in Nonbacktracking Regex engine #65637
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • crossgen2: Add --imagebase option #65567
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65328
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • WIP: switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
